alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 26 at 6:23AM AKDT until March 26 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Total snow accumulations of up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions have already occuring. Winds and blowing snow should taper off this afternoon.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
